niagara.physical
Class SimpleAtomicEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  niagara.physical.SimpleAtomicEvaluator

public class SimpleAtomicEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

A simplified version of AtomicEvaluator, for cases where we just want the string value of a tuple attribute, without following paths
